title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 563.15 - Multiple use plant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 563.15 - Multiple use plant

State Regulations

Land, rights-of-way and structures used jointly for
several functions, such as supply, and transmission and distribution purposes, shall be classified according to the major use thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
563.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
